feeMaker(DataTypes.OBPairConfigMap stora.details: Gets the maker fee of order book pair

returns._0: The maker fee + 1 if fee exist or else 0*

feeTaker(DataTypes.OBPairConfigMap stora.details: Gets the taker fee of order book pair
